card.name: Cadix, the Raze-Rager
card.text: Cadix, the Raze-Rager has flash as long as it’s your turn. Trample Ward—Pay 3 life. Cadix, the Raze-Rager gets -2/-2 for each land you control.

card.name: Quintarchal Ascension
card.text: Untap all permanents and put a stun counter on them.

card.name: Calf of the Restored Age
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, if you cast a spell this turn and haven’t spent mana from lands to cast a spell this turn, draw a card.

card.name: Buffer Overflow
card.text: If it isn’t an extra turn, take an extra turn after this one. Retopology UUUUUUUU (Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying UUUUUUUU. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)

card.name: Duplicate Specialty
card.text: Create a token that’s a copy of target permanent, except its name is Mirrored Entity. Retopology 2UUUU (Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying its retopology cost. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)

card.name: Corrupted Protocol
card.text: Zombies you control get +1/+1. Whenever an opponent loses life, you may tap Corrupted Protocol. If you do, you may cast a Zombie card from your graveyard with mana value less than or equal to the amount of life lost.

card.name: Discover the Obsolete
card.text: Repeat the following process for each nontoken Aura or Equipment you control. For each player or nontoken permanent it could enchant or equip, you may create a token that’s a copy of that Aura or Equipment attached to that permanent or player.

card.name: Suffocating Pollution
card.text: Whenever a player casts a spell other than their first spell each turn, that player loses 3 life. Whenever a player casts a spell from their hand, they get {V/W}. Then they discard a card if they have six or more {V}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Paleoartistic Masterpiece
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast for each land type among lands you control. Flying Whenever Paleoartistic Masterpiece attacks, the next spell you cast this turn costs {1} less to cast for each land type among lands you control as this ability resolved.

card.name: Rogue Process
card.text: Trample, haste Retopology CCC (Cast a copy of this from your graveyard by exiling it and paying its retopology cost. Spend only mana from differently named sources this way.)

card.name: Rhystic Palace
card.text: Bake (When this enters, up to one other target permanent gains its abilities until end of turn.) Rhystic Palace enters tapped. {T}: Add one mana of any color. {1}: Tap this permanent. Only your opponents may activate this ability and only once each turn.

card.name: Ancient Activator
card.text: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card. Then if a library has twenty or fewer cards in it, create a colorless 0/0 Fractal Horror creature token with three +1/+1 counters on it. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Deprecated Dump
card.text: As Deprecated Dump enters, exile an untapped land you control until Deprecated Dump leaves the battlefield. Deprecated Dump has all activated and triggered abilities of cards exiled by it. Whenever you tap Deprecated Dump for mana, add {C}.

card.name: Conquex, Broken Mandate
Hallway Thomasson
card.text: At the beginning of each player’s upkeep, that player chooses half the permanents they control, rounded down. Those permanents phase out. (Treat phased-out permanents and anything attached to them as though they don’t exist until their controller’s next turn.)

card.name: Nilshroud Apex
card.text: Whenever Nilshroud Apex attacks, you lose 2 life and you get {V/W}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.) --- (You can cast copies of this while in play.) At the beginning of your upkeep, Wound deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Guzzle Giblets
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. You draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature’s power, get an amount of {V} equal to its toughess, and gain an amount of life equal to its mana value. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Deprecated Harvest
card.text: When Deprecated Harvest enters, you get {V/U}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.) {T}, Exile a Texture or a Texture card from your graveyard: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

card.name: Albedo Arbalest
card.text: (This spell gains effects based on the sources of mana spent to cast it.) I — Land — Tap all creatures target player controls. II — Artifact — Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls. III — Enchantment — Target player gains 5 life.

card.name: Occult Occlusion
card.text: (This spell gains effects based on the sources of mana spent to cast it.) I — Land — Occult Occlusion deals 3 damage to target player and you gain 3 life. II — Artifact — Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life. III — Instant — Target player sacrifices a nontoken creature or enchantment.

card.name: Metallic Mirage
card.text: (This spell gains effects based on the sources of mana spent to cast it.) I — Land — Return target spell or nonland permanent to its owner’s hand. II — Creature — When you cast your next noncreature spell this turn, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copies. III — Sorcery — Add CCC.

card.name: Roughness Rails
card.text: (This spell gains effects based on the sources of mana spent to cast it.) I — Land — Until end of turn, if a source would deal damage to target player, it deals double that damage instead. II — Instant — Roughness Rails deals 2 damage to any target. III — Sorcery — Roughness Rails deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Subsurface Scattering
card.text: (This spell gains effects based on the sources of mana spent to cast it.) I — Land — Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Subsurface Scattering. II — Creature — Scry 2, then draw a card. III — Enchantment — You may put a land card from your graveyard or hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Voracious Mollusk
card.text: Whenever an effect instructs an opponent to pay life or mana, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. (This includes optional costs, but not costs to play a spell or ability. This triggers even if the cost isn’t paid.)

card.name: Flagstones of the Broken Age
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: You get {V/W}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.)

card.name: Memory Spike
card.text: Target opponent mills seven cards.

card.name: Nilshroud Mockery
card.text: Draw two cards, then put a nonland card from your hand into your command zone. It becomes Vertex in addition to its other types, and costs an additional {V/B} to cast. (You may repeatedly cast copies of that card by paying its mana cost and Vertex cost.)

card.name: Grim Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.

card.name: Crashing Rot
card.text: Mill four cards. For each card milled this way, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put that card into your hand.

card.name: Rapid Terraforming
card.text: Tap an untapped permanent you control: Rapid Terraforming deals 1 damage to any target. Tapped an untapped permanent you control: Add {R}. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Rapid Terraforming.

card.name: Relentless Consumption
card.text: Whenever a player loses life, you gain that much {V}. (Spend {V} to cast copies of Vertex spells.) {T}: Add CCC.

card.name: Friends Unfettered
card.text: Search your library for up to four creature cards with different names and reveal them. An opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand, then shuffle.

card.name: Shard of Conquex
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {1},{T}: Add one mana of any color. WUBRG, {T}, Sacrifice Shard of Conquex: It deals 5 damage to any target and you gain 5 life. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Prefabrication
card.text: {T}: Create a 2/2 blue Bird creature token with flying. Activate only if your complexity is five or greater or if Prefabrication entered the battlefield this turn. (Your complexity is the number of spells you’ve cast and nonland abilities you’ve activated this turn.)

card.name: Ray Tracing
card.text: Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield. Until end of turn, you may cast spells exiled this way.

card.name: Tromping Iguanodon
card.text: Haste {0}: Put up to two land cards from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only once each turn and only if you control no lands. {T}, Sacrifice a land: Draw a card and put a +1/+1 counter on Tromping Iguanodon.

card.name: Perpetual Cycle
card.text: If you would add an amount of mana, instead create that many 1/1 red Dinosaur creature tokens that can’t block. Rather than pay an amount of mana, you may sacrifice that many permanents instead.

card.name: Sudden Emergence
card.text: Draw three cards. If five or more permanents incremented your complexity this turn, you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. (Your complexity is the number of spells you’ve cast and nonland abilities you’ve activated this turn.)

card.name: Envoy of Debauchery
card.text: Flash Bake (When this enters, up to one other target permanent gains its abilities until end of turn.) Defender, haste {2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 3 life and you gain 3 life. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

card.name: Eons of Ancestry
card.text: Enchant creature If you would put cards from your hand on the bottom of your library during mulligans, you may reveal Eons of Ancestry from your hand instead. Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 for each permanent attached to it.
